attributes.action: Ban the caravan from our roads between 7am and 11pm.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have you been stuck behind a caravan, thats being towed by an underpowered car at 40mph or less. When there seems to be no reason why they aren't doing the speed limit. Removing them will free up our roads and increase traffic flow.
